channel.title: Adding You Cannot use the ::xtele command in wild?
channel.description: Hi I want to add it so for the ::xteleto command that you can't tele to someone in wild and maybe for the ::xteletome to I know it has to do something with else if abX and abY send message you cannot tele to someone in the wildy.

item.title: Adding You Cannot use the ::xtele command in wild?
item.dc:creator: @cwg452003 cwg452003
item.description:
@cwg452003 wrote:

[code]if (command.startsWith(“xteleto”) && (playerRights >=1))
{
try{
String otherPName = command.substring(8);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);
if(otherPIndex != -1)
{
client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
if(p.nonWild())
{
teleportToX = p.absX;
teleportToY = p.absY;
heightLevel = p.heightLevel;
updateRequired = true;
// PlayerHandler.messageToAdmins = "Teleto: “+playerName+” has teleported to "+p.playerName;
sendMessage("Teleto: You teleport to "+p.playerName);
}
else
{
sendMessage(“You can’t teleport to someone in the wild!”);
}
}
}
catch(Exception e) { sendMessage(“Try entering a name you want to tele to…”); }

}[/code]

Read full topic
item.source: Adding You Cannot use the ::xtele command in wild?
